features: 2 WAYS CONTROL: With 𝑮𝒆𝒔𝒕𝒖𝒓𝒆 𝑹𝒆𝒄𝒐𝒈𝒏𝒊𝒕𝒊𝒐𝒏 𝑻𝒆𝒄𝒉𝒏𝒐𝒍𝒐𝒈𝒚, RGB Desktop Lamp with Clamp is easy to be adjusted brightness and color temperature with your hand and is equipped with a wireless 𝑹𝒆𝒎𝒐𝒕𝒆 𝑪𝒐𝒏𝒕𝒓𝒐𝒍, you can easily control the LED Desk Lamp through the wireless remote control and choose the lighting mode that suits you best

7 𝑹𝒐𝒕𝒂𝒕𝒊𝒏𝒈 𝑷𝒂𝒓𝒕𝒔: The bright desk lamp boasts a cutting-edge 3 light source design, featuring 2 RGB lights and 1 white light, and comes with 3 robust damping joints, 1 adjustable bottom, allowing for both vertical and horizontal adjustments, act as you like.

𝐒𝐭𝐫𝐨𝐧𝐠 𝐂𝐥𝐚𝐦𝐩 𝐭𝐨 𝐒𝐚𝐯𝐞 𝐒𝐩𝐚𝐜𝐞: The Architect Table Lamp comes with an extra wide metal clamp(2.7in/68mm) and an all-aluminum lamp body. The clip holds tabletops up to (2.5in/63mm) thick and holds the swing arm lamp firmly in place.

𝑴𝒖𝒍𝒕𝒊𝒑𝒍𝒆 𝑳𝒊𝒈𝒉𝒕𝒊𝒏𝒈 𝑪𝒐𝒎𝒃𝒊𝒏𝒂𝒕𝒊𝒐𝒏𝒔: You can click the touch panel to adjust the 5 levels of brightness and color temperatures step by step, or you can long press the panel for stepless dimming (20% - 100%) and stepless tempering (3000K - 6500K). The memory function will restore your last setting.

𝑺𝒂𝒕𝒊𝒔𝒇𝒂𝒄𝒕𝒊𝒐𝒏 𝑮𝒖𝒂𝒓𝒂𝒏𝒕𝒆𝒆𝒅: The Valentines Day lights come with a 12-month warranty and 30-day free replacement service. We'll be online 24/7. If you encounter any difficulties when using our curtain lights, please feel free to contact our customer service and we will provide you with a satisfactory solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's adding a touch of magic and personality.
reviews.reviewText: The ilumeplay Desktop Light is not just a lamp; it's a rockstar in the world of desk illuminators, earning a standing ovation with a five-star performance!Imagine a lamp that's not just about light but a captivating light show. With its 3 Light Source Design, featuring RGB lights and a white light ensemble, it turns your workspace into a lively concert of colors. It's like having your own mini light festival right on your desk! And the best part? It's not just a pretty face; it's got the brains to match with gesture recognition technology, making it as easy to adjust as your favorite playlist.Flexibility is its superpower. With 7 joints that dance to your lighting needs, it's the ultimate choreographer for your desk ambiance. Need a spotlight for work or a chill vibe for relaxation? This lamp has got the moves to match your rhythm. The ultra-wide metal clamp and sleek all-aluminum body add a touch of durability and elegance – the lamp is basically the James Bond of desk accessories.But here's the real magic – it's remote-controlled! Adjusting brightness and color temperature is as fun as selecting your favorite movie on a lazy Sunday afternoon. It's like having a magic wand for your lighting whims. And if you ever miss your perfect setting, fear not – the memory function brings it back with a snap, offering a personalized lighting encore.Now, picture this lamp as the life of the party, suitable for every scene. From gaming extravaganzas to focused work sessions and cozy reading nooks, it's the guest of honor in every setting. And here's the quirky twist – it can groove to your voice! Just speak, and watch the lamp adjust its lighting like a DJ spinning tracks at a club. Talk about a lamp with a sense of humor!In the grand finale, the ilumeplay Desktop Light isn't just brightening your space; it's adding a touch of magic and personality. If desk lamps could throw confetti, this one would be leading the parade. A true luminary that doesn't just light up your room but turns it into a stage for your daily performances. Five stars for the lamp that's more than just a light – it's a showstopper!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Truly useful features rarely found in other desk lamps
reviews.reviewText: There is much about this lamp that is exceptional, some features are truly unique, but I find one feature of uncommon utility and that is the wireless remote., which adjusts color balance and brightness as well as on/off. Having a choice of placement of, and thus accessibility to, the controls allows one to readily make use of those adjustments as ambient light conditions change and one’s area of focus with the desktop landscape changes. The more lamps you have, and the larger the active workspace area is in use, the more valuable this ability becomes.For context, much of every day I am at my desk at home sitting in front of two large monitors writing up forensic reports—all too often well into the night. Ambient lighting changes greatly over that time—both due to what light comes from outside and the number of lights on inside. Nearly every inch of my desktop is covered with pages of notes, test sheets, and medical and legal records. My 7 decade old eyes require more light to see clearly across the entire desk and monitors. To achieve that, I have wide lamp heads facing down over each monitor and two side lamps for coverage to each side of the keyboard. I also have one gooseneck spotlight to shine directly down into opened side drawers of the desk. All of these high quality lights are capable of providing variable illumination, but only two make it easy to achieve—those with controls off the light itself. Only those two—one with a wired remote, and this one which is wireless— allow me to change the settings without distraction or need to shift my attention away from my work. For me, that makes these the most used and valued lights on the desk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Clamp not very sturdy
reviews.reviewText: Nice light and I like the articulated arm. Having a remote is really handy, although not the most important feature. The RBG is pretty useless. But it is decently bright and good to have. The biggest concern is the clamp used to secure it to the desk. It's a really small clamp and when you move the lamp it feels like the clamp is going to break. Also it has a motion detector that doesn't seem to be able to be turned off. That is kind of annoying since it can activate when you don't intend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic Desk Lamp
reviews.reviewText: I needed a new desk lamp that didn't take up desk space, was bright and adjustable, and stood tall so it wouldn't glare in my eyes. This lamp fills those priorities perfectly. And it has lots of other bells and whistles that I didn't need but sure come in handy and some that are just plain cool. The motion sensor to turn it on and off is way better than trying to find at button in the dark. The sensor has a small LED light next to it so you just have to wave your hand within a couple inches in front of the LED to turn it on and off. The remote allows you to adjust the brightness and color temperature of the lamp as well as turn it on or off. It also lets you turn on the cool features. On the back of the arm and the top of the lamp are color changing LEDs and you can adjust the color and mode of these LEDs. It also lets you turn these LEDs into music mode where lamp listens to the music your're playing and it makes the lights flash to the music. Again these are cool features but not necessary on a desk lamp, but they sure are fun.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great task light
reviews.reviewText: This is a great task light. It took a little while to get it in the right spot because my desk is so cluttered. I finally have it set up just right and the remote makes it so simple to turn on and off. Not sure about the “motion sensor” settings though. I just use the little remote.
